ValidationRule.description: Requiring the Account Billing Address is necessary for Finance.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( ISBLANK(Account.BillingStreet), ISBLANK(Account.BillingCity), ISPICKVAL(Account.BillingCountryCode, ""), AND( ISPICKVAL(Account.BillingCountryCode, "US"), OR( ISPICKVAL(Account.BillingStateCode, ""), ISBLANK(Account.BillingPostalCode) ) ) ), ISCHANGED(StageName), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Closed Won") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please provide a valid Billing Address on the Account record for this Opportunity before moving to Closed Won.
